tags: None
review: The doctor gives an explanation for his diagnosis. went in for a severe back pain. He just took an X-ray and established that my Spine is fine and treated it with medicine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited for issuers with my Slip disc and Sciatica. The moment he stepped in to Hospital gave a friendly, broad smile with no attitude which makes anyone feel most comfortable. To my surprise he apologized for being just 5 minutes late to my scheduled appointment (9am), by mentioning that it's because of traffic hurdles which is hardly seen. His invaluable patience in clarifying my doubts, humbleness, depth of knowledge, making me understand my issues in a simpler way with examples were exemplary.  He is totally service oriented.  500/- Rs. consultation charges is nothing compared to the honest services he extended by giving full time, without rushing to wind up the case.        Doctor examined me physically, checked my MRI reports, explained in detail what the issue is with my lower back ( Spinal Stenosis ), filled in confidence to me by a  very detailed explanation of where the nerve is pinched, exactly where the canal is narrowed, why I have been  experiencing numbness, tingling, crawling sensations, difficulty in long standing and walking and he relieved off my worries and apprehension about surgery by making it very clear that all these symptoms will be reduced to 80-90% to least a normal life.       It's not an exaggeration if I say that Doctor G S Swamy is Godly, any patient whom he attends would experience the same feeling for sure, such a humble person he is.    Even when I mentioned that I had been to him for a second medical opinion only, there was no change in his attitude towards attending to me as an honest, service minded doctor.  Hats off to this godly personality.   How I wish all the doctors were like Sri G S Swamy.         Anyone with ortho  issues can consult him with no second thought, I assure that it's a worthy, very reasonable consultation with ultimate treatment. May God bless him with a very good health.           Our society badly needs such noble doctors.Thanks in abundance, Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very friendly. He was attentive to the information we gave and also asked few questions about the incident to my daughter. He conducted couple of movement test and shared his observations. He informed us that the pain will subside in few days as the ligament takes few days to heal. I personally believe that there are few doctors, to whom when the patient meets and speaks with them,  the patient starts feeling he is already half cured. Dr. Gowrishakar is one of those doctors. I wish him all the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Am extremely happy nd overwhelmed by the conversation i had wid Dr.Gowrishankar swamy .i had took my  Dad for his Hip pain treatment.He explained the condition so well in an easily understandable manner. He advices Conservative mode of treatment which makes him unique from other orthopedicians out there.I feel he has put his heart n soul into his practice. Very service oriented person. I was fortunate enough to get a consultation from him for my dad.Thank you so much doctor 😊. Highly recommended for any kind of orthopedic related issues . 

Regards,
Dr.karthik s kumar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi,
This doctor was very calm and friendly in his approach. Patiently heard what we had to say, went through previous x-rays and followed it up by proper physical examination. He said we are making good progress and didn't even seek another x-ray which most doctors do today. He boosted my mother's morale a lot and said that she should do everything she was doing before the injury , with caution of course, and strictly said no for bed-rest. For an elderly person those words mean the world. The previous doctor had scared us and had also suggested MRI. Had we seen this doctor instead  of that guy I'm sure my mother would have recovered sooner. Thank you Practice for compiling his info. This is the second time we were guided to the right doc by Practo

tags: None
review: Excellent service and no wait time , was attended too as you walk in with reliable and trustworthy treatment. Excellent professional doctor, focused on state of the art treatment with no out dated ok fashioned cast , offered valuable advice for easy care and able todo ones daily chores

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The Doctor was very friendly and happy to hear about issues. And the way he had motivated and sent us back with moral confidence was phenomenal. And he didn't even subscribed unnecessary medication, gave few tips and told follow them. Really happy and thanks to People Tree Hospitals.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We were called in for doc appointment as scheduled. The doctor patiently listened to all the complaints,  and took time to examine as a whole. He explained to us the nature of the problem and need for more investigations at subsequent follow up if pain doesn't resolve with the prescribed medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very considerate and caring team of doctors Dr. Alok n Dr. Gowri. treat patients with dignity. Detailed Explanation of the condition, testament procedure, follow up process etc. Post surgery when there was oozing of fluid, I was given immediate care and dressing done. The assurance makes patient feel comfortable and positive. On the whole my experience at PTH pre and post surgery has been very good.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Gowri Shankar Sir and his team analysed the issue that my mom is having at the back and conducted Laminectomy Surgery. She was on wheelchair while admitting and walking on her own now without support. Am very gratefull to him and his team along with Dr Pramod Sudarshan who showed us a ray of hope and for fulfilling the promise of making my mom Walk. I can't thank enough for what they have done. Thank you so much from all of us.

review: He is very friendly, approachable and makes the patient comfortable during prognosis. While i was told by other doctors on earlier occasions to ease out on my profession, Dr Gowrishankar assured me that I could go back to doing what I liked doing the most.
